description: This group describes attributes specific to [software tests](https://wikipedia.org/wiki/Software_testing).

test.suite.name.description: The human readable name of a [test suite](https://wikipedia.org/wiki/Test_suite).

test.suite.run.status.description: The status of the test suite run.

test.case.name.description: The fully qualified human readable name of the [test case](https://wikipedia.org/wiki/Test_case).

test.case.result.status.description: The status of the actual test case result from test execution.
